text: José Miguel Villaú Cabeza (born Mont-de-Marsan, 30 October 1971) is a French- born Spanish rugby union player. He plays as a lock. ==Career== His first international match was against Morocco, at Toulouse, on 28 November 1993. He was part of the 1999 Rugby World Cup roster, playing all the three matches. His last international cap was during a match against Portugal, at Madrid, on 2 June 2002. ==External links== *José Miguel Villaú International Statistics Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish rugby union players Category:Rugby union locks Category:Spain international rugby union players
title: José Miguel Villaú
